title: Thunderbird email error resulting in inability to send or receive emails in Thunderbird
content:
I get the pop up that includes Add Security Exception 

 You are about to override how Thunderbird identifies this site.

Legitimate banks, stores, and other public sites will not ask You to do this. Location:

This site attempts to identify itself with invalid Information. Unknown Identity The certificate is not trusted because it hasnâ€™t been verified as issued by a trusted authority using a secure signature. 

 Permanently store this exception

I am in Australia and Optus is my email provider. They have checked all is working at their end and suggest I contact Thunderbird which is why I am here.

Thanking you for trying to help
creator: corinneb7

title: how change from version 115 to 127 ?
content: Hello, I am using version 115 of Thunderbird portable, I would like to change to version 127, how should I do it?
creator: maraskus

title: Unable to change displayed font size when composing
content: Using TBird 115.10.1 64-bit on Windows 11. For ease of reading text in mail I am composing, I would like to select a large font size. In Settings | Fonts I chose Arial 18; but for some reason I get a small monospaced font whenever I start a new message. I can enlarge it with Ctrl-Plus, but it reverts to its old ways for the next new message. How can I make the change stick?
creator: ronks1

title: Message filter
content: My message filter appears not to be working any more. I can't even get the "run now" button to manually filter messages. Please help.bold text
creator: bawdenrob69
